custom_nodes.author: S4MUEL404
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI S4Tool Text
custom_nodes.description: Text rendering and styling nodes for ComfyUI. This extension provides a basic text renderer, multiple font loaders, and a style node that adds stroke, shadow, gradient fill, and opacity control.

custom_nodes.author: luke-mino-altherr
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Latent-Reverb
custom_nodes.description: Creates spatial echo and ambient effects by applying reverb-like processing directly in latent space

custom_nodes.author: iacoposk8
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI XOR Text & Pickle Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Three custom nodes for ComfyUI that allow you to encrypt and decrypt Python objects or text using simple XOR encryption.

custom_nodes.author: shinich39
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-poor-textarea
custom_nodes.description: Add commentify, indentation, auto-close brackets in textarea.

custom_nodes.author: HM-RunningHub
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI DMOSpeech2 Node
custom_nodes.description: This is a Seed-X-PPO-7B ComfyUI plugin. Easy to use

custom_nodes.author: Charonartist
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Smart Resize Node

custom_nodes.author: Windecay
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-SDupcaleTiledSize
custom_nodes.description: Assist in determining reasonable input values for tiled_width/tiled_height in the UltimateSDUpscale node to improve efficiency.

custom_nodes.author: educator-art
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-gpt-oss-PromptDesigner
custom_nodes.description: Using the ollama gpt-oss:20b model, a prompt is generated. The user enters the desired theme into a custom node and runs it, and the model outputs a Stable Diffusion prompt. This is useful when you want the model to handle prompt creation for you.

custom_nodes.author: stduhpf
custom_nodes.title: KSampler for Wan 2.2 MoE for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: These nodes are made to support 'Mixture of Expert' Flow models with the architecture of Wan2.2 A14B (With a high noise expert and low noise expert). Instead of guessing the denoising step at which to swap from tyhe high noise model to the low noise model, this node automatically chanage to the low noise model when we reach the diffusion timestep at which the signal to noise ratio is supposed to be 1:1.

custom_nodes.author: shinich39
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-global-prompts
custom_nodes.description: Set global prompts using note node.

custom_nodes.author: HSDHCdev
custom_nodes.title: AI Pixel Art Enhancer for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Pixel art Enhancement Node for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: Rzgar Espo
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Qwen-Image-Size-Picker
custom_nodes.description: A universal node for generating empty latent tensors with support for Qwen Image, SDXL and Flux models. Features extended aspect ratio support, batch processing, and flexible dimension overrides.

custom_nodes.author: S4MUEL404
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI S4Motion
custom_nodes.description: A set of ComfyUI nodes for animating a foreground layer over a background, with unified timing and high-quality composition. It includes effectors for rotation, position, path-following position, scale, opacity, distortion, and masking, plus a core node that composes frames and exports APNG/WEBP and a frame sequence.

custom_nodes.author: eric183

It also adds a js extension for a better UI experience.

Features modular engine adapters, character voice management, comprehensive SRT subtitle support, and advanced audio processing capabilities.

custom_nodes.author: jiafuzeng
custom_nodes.title: LatentSync
custom_nodes.description: We present LatentSync, an end-to-end lip-sync method based on audio-conditioned latent diffusion models without any intermediate motion representation, diverging from previous diffusion-based lip-sync methods based on pixel-space diffusion or two-stage generation. Our framework can leverage the powerful capabilities of Stable Diffusion to directly model complex audio-visual correlations.
